Pafo.definition: water, a fundamental element, essential for life

Kubi.definition: fire, a fundamental elemental force, represents warmth or danger

Tane.definition: earth, the ground or soil, representing nature and stability

Lumi.definition: air, the invisible substance we breathe, represents freedom and life

Soru.definition: food, essential for survival, representing nourishment

Bato.definition: stone, a hard and natural substance, represents strength and permanence

Fali.definition: tree, a type of large plant, symbolizing growth and nature

Rino.definition: animal, a non-human creature, represents the diversity of life

Menu.definition: person, a human being, an observer and participant in the world

Voki.definition: voice, the sound produced by humans, represents communication
